,TRUE,4,4,1,4,4 pagani88","2015-08-09T14:02:49.23Z","freeeeee!","

earlier this week, I went out to my local Lego store to pick up the new Ferrari F40, and was given this for free. Not bad.

standard minifig polybag. A large image of the Winter Soldier adorns the front, with the parts count, recommended age and other info on the left hand side. There is an Avengers Initiative logo in the lower right corner. Instructions aren'
PARTS: There are only 4 parts included in this set, the ones to make the minifig.

Of course, only one here. He has a hairpiece which has appeared before a number of times, and all the other pieces are exclusive. His head has two faces, one with a mask covering his mouth, and the other a grimace, with a mask over the eyes. His torso is black with front and back prints, consisting of armour and straps. he has a metal arm with a soviet red star and lines printed on it, to represent layered metal. His right leg is printed with a holster on the front and side.
overall, this is a great minifigure, and will look good in anybody'

column1:
,TRUE,4,4,3,3,5 Lordmoral","2015-10-11T03:48:49.627Z","Almost on target","

Hello everybody and thanks for taking the time to read my review of an amazing minifigure.

No instructions are provided as building is pretty much straightforward where the only thing you have to know is that this minifigure has two faces (classic face mask and the Capt America 2 Winter Soldier version). The polybag is also pretty well made.

The selection of parts is amazing except that it could have very well included some sort of weapons (other than his robo arm). The ideas could have been: sniper rifle giving his deadly display on the Winter Soldier movie or his granade
column2: launcher that fires metal adhering capabilities.&nbsp

column1: The one minifigure it includes is the titular Winter Soldier who is Capt WW2 friend turned Hydra unwilling hit man during a very late period of time. Has reversible face and the printing is glorious. His robotic arm has the Red Star of his affiliation with the Soviet Union. His torso features an empty gun holster that could have been included with him.
You just decide what version of the WS you want based on the face.

As I stated this is a superb figure that will be highly sought after giving his importance in Caps America movie and I hopefull that where Lego to include him on future sets he should be given a lot of accessories (weapons).

,TRUE,5,4,5,3,5 Wendigo1","2019-11-09T00:31:04.687Z","Bucky or Robin?","

Review 8 is another mini figure in a poly bag,
column2: 5002943-1: Winter Soldier. Is the only set that comes from the best standalone movie in the MCU as good as the source? Eh....

column1: Build/Minifigure: Well, there are only 4 pieces in this set. The hair, head, torso and legs of James Buchanan Barnes, aka Bucky aka the Winter Soldier. Simple and to the point, the parts are partially unique and partially not. The head has two faces, one that looks like a DC Nightwing or Robin print while the other is the unique mask from the source material that only covers the nose and mouth. Much the same is on the torso, where a plain black arm and hand is paired with the unique sliver arm and hand printed with the red star. This arm is really sharp with its black lines to give the appearance of the paneling found in the source. The legs are plain black with a printed holster on the right thigh. Nothing too special here.
The parts that are unique are really great and make for an outstanding figure, however, so much is repeated or plain that it mars the overall product. It'
column2: s too bad such a great movie never got the set or sets it deserves. I found this on OfferUp for a great price, but I wouldn&#39
column3: t pay too much like this set can garner. Overall it&#39
column4: s just an eh set for me.
